fields.text: Thank you for calling Cadence Design Systems in South Bay, delivering industry-leading hardware and computer vision design enablement solutions.
For assistance with our electronic design automation tools, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a technical specialist for EDA tools support.
For help with system design IP and integration, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a technical specialist for IP solutions.
For sales, licensing, and account services, press [INDEX].
If you would like to inquire about purchasing new licenses, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for new license inquiries.
For questions about existing orders or account management, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our account management team.
